author: stsp
msg: For issue #4087, normalize file external URLs.
The core problem with issue #4087 is that wc-ng currently requires all
files in the working copy to have the same repository root URL, because
the repository ID for each file is generated based on the repository
root URL and the repository UUID.
When a file external is installed in the working copy, and the URL supplied
by the external definition does not match the repository root URL used by
the working copy, perform a UUId check to find out if both URLs point to
the same repository. If so, we normalise the file external's URL before
switching the file in a way that file externals always use the same
repository root URL as all other files.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/externals_tests.py
(file_externals_different_repos): Rename to ...
(file_externals_different_url): ... this, because this test uses two
matching copies of the same repository to simulate access to the same
repository via different URLs. Make expectations match the current
behaviour, and add additional verification steps that make sure file
externals are using a normalised URL.
* subversion/libsvn_client/externals.c
(handle_external_item_change): If the URL supplied by the file external
definition does not match the URL of the working copy, switch the file
external to an adjusted URL that uses the same repository root as all
other files in the working copy. Add a comment to explain that this
is a workaround for issue #4087.
